channel.title: functional programming on Gustavo Caso
channel.description: Recent content in functional programming on Gustavo Caso

item.title: Functional programming aspects of the Ruby language
item.description: Revised by Andy Holland Lately, there has been a significant change in the industry towards functional programming, new languages have appeared: Elixir, Scala, Elm. With all this new hype I decided to give a try to some of them, and I have to say that they are really cool, but wether I like it at work I mostly use ruby.
